mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_USER (ID, EXTRACTS_ID, USER_ID, CREATED_AT, PROJECT_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extractsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,
EXTRACTS_ID,
USER_ID,
CREATED_AT,

UPDATED_AT,

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_USER
EXTRACTS_ID = #{extractsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_USER set EXTRACTS_ID = #{extractsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_USER (PROJECT_ID,REL_NAME,COMPANY,PHONE,DUTIES)
select #{item.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.duties,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.select: select wm_concat(REL_NAME) from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_USER where RECORD_ID =#{value}

SELECT * FROM T_SES_EXTRACT_SUPERVISE WHERE IS_DELETE = 0
AND NAME LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
AND COMPARY LIKE concat(concat('%',#{compary}),'%')
AND DUTY LIKE concat(concat('%',#{duty}),'%')
AND RANK LIKE concat(concat('%',#{rank}),'%')
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO T_SES_EXTRACT_SUPERVISE (ID,NAME,COMPARY,DUTY,RANK) VALUES (#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.compary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT U.* FROM T_SES_EXTRACT_SUPERVISE U LEFT JOIN T_SES_EXT_RECORD_REL_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = U.ID WHERE P.PERSON_TYPE = 'supervise' AND P.IS_DELETE = '0' AND P.RECORD_ID = #{value}
